instruction: Can the developed method using excitation emission matrix (EEM) fluorescence spectroscopy and a machine learning algorithm be considered superior to traditional methods in identifying the source of particulate matter (PM)?

Traditional methods for identifying PM sources are often limited in their accuracy and effectiveness. However, the use of EEM fluorescence spectroscopy combined with a machine learning algorithm allows for more precise and reliable identification of PM sources.
